summary: Shirley helps her idealistic architect father get his dream of a slum clearance project; The little miss dances with bill "Bojangles" robinson. Based on paul gerard smith's book, "Lucky penny".
cast: Shirley Temple|Joan Davis|Charles Farrell|Amanda Duff|Bill Robinson|Bert Lahr|Franklin Pangborn|Cora Witherspoon|Claude Gillingwater|Benny Bartlett|Brooks Benedict|Orville Caldwell|Eddie Conrad|Hal K. Dawson|Helen Dickson|Jack Egger|Mary Forbes|Jack Gargan|Harold Goodwin|Frances Hughes|J. Anthony Hughes|Leonard Kibrick|Sidney Kibrick|Marilyn Knowlden|Ethan Laidlaw|Paul McVey|Edgar Norton|Johnny Thomas|Billy Wayne|Charles Williams
title: Just Around the Corner
